name: ELK Agent Installation Template
description: This integration template installs the Filebeat agent on a deployed VM and registers it with the IBM Cloud Private ELK stack.

metadata.longDescription: This integration template installs Filebeat on a deployed VM and registers it with the IBM Cloud Private ELK stack. The filebeat agent installer(filebeat-6.2.2-amd64.deb  filebeat-6.2.2-x86_64.rpm) must be available in the evironment and accessible via a URI (http/s, ftp, file). It is assumed that an ELK endpoint has been installed and accessible from the target VM.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description: 1. The IBM Cloud Private ELK does not support receiving logs from external sources by default. See the documentation for how to enable this.
